DocumentsHelper#auto_extract_icon for document with available extraction renders the Auto Extract icon
DocumentsHelper#auto_extract_total_value for document without extraction is expected to be blank
DocumentsHelper#auto_extract_total_value for document with available extraction with round receipt total is expected to eq "16.00"
DocumentsHelper#auto_extract_total_value for document with available extraction with large receipt total is expected to eq "16,000,000.00"
DocumentsHelper#auto_extract_total_value for document with available extraction with available extraction but no receipt total is expected to be blank
DocumentsHelper#auto_extract_total_value_pending_or_available for document without extraction is expected to be blank
DocumentsHelper#auto_extract_total_value_pending_or_available for document with pending extraction is expected to include "Processing"
DocumentsHelper#auto_extract_total_value_pending_or_available for document with available extraction is expected to eq "16.75"
DocumentsHelper#auto_extract_total_value_pending_or_available for document with available extraction but no receipt total is expected to be blank
DocumentsHelper#auto_extract_details_partial available extract is expected to eq "document_details_extracted"
DocumentsHelper#auto_extract_details_partial unavailable extract is expected to eq "document_details_unavailable"
DocumentsHelper#auto_extract_details_partial pending extract is expected to eq "document_details_pending"
DocumentsHelper#auto_extract_details_partial pending submission extract is expected to eq "document_details_pending"
DocumentsHelper#privacy_level when document kind is shared is expected to eq "Shared"
DocumentsHelper#privacy_level when document kind is personal is expected to eq "Private"
DocumentsHelper#options_for_privacy is expected to eq {"Private"=>"personal", "Shared"=>"shared"}

WistiaHelper#wistia_video_tag called with a single argument is expected to include "title=\"\""

examples.description: is expected to be html safe
examples.full_description: WistiaHelper#wistia_video_tag with malicious arguments is expected to be html safe
WistiaHelper#wistia_video_tag with malicious arguments is expected to include "<iframe"
WistiaHelper#wistia_video_tag with malicious arguments is expected not to match /src="https:\/\/fast\.wistia\.net\/embed\/iframe\/"><\/iframe><script>alert("boom");<\/script>.*"\//
WistiaHelper#wistia_video_tag with malicious arguments is expected not to include "title=\"\"></iframe><script>alert(\"boom\");</script>\""
WistiaHelper#wistia_video_tag with malicious arguments is expected not to include "<script>"
WistiaHelper#wistia_video_tag with malicious arguments is expected to include "<script>"
